nodes.text: A mausoleum was a built in the swamps of the planet Rodia for the Rodian Jedi Huulik after he was killed by clone troopers during Order 66. The mausoleum was visited shortly after the Battle of Yavin by the Jedi Luke Skywalker and Huulik's niece Taneetch Soonta. Soonta gifted Huulik's lightsaber to Skywalker, believing he could put it to good use.
